arts.ttl: Delighted Mark Robins' 'nit picking' verdict on big Stoke City win over Blackburn
arts.sum: "Wouter Burger's performance was outstanding, JT's was really, really good, right-back, left-back, Eric Bocat coming in, they've worked their socks off and to get through that period of time that he did Eric was good. Viktor Johansson only had two saves to make at the other end but they were both terrific and Stoke, although they were forced deeper through 10 added minutes at the end of the second half, finally got the result over the line.

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers player ratings as poor displays sparks further frustration
arts.sum: Marks out of ten as Blackburn Rovers were beaten at Stoke City

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers' lacklustre display sees play-off dream slip further away
arts.sum: Blackburn Rovers were beaten 1-0 by Stoke City in the Championship

arts.ttl: Valerien Ismael answers Blackburn Rovers confidence question in Stoke verdict
arts.sum: Blakcburn Rovers' head coach was encouraged by the second-half display despite a 1-0 defeat at Stoke City

arts.ttl: Stoke edge Blackburn to ease relegation fears
arts.sum: Ali Al-Hamadi scored as Stoke boosted their Championship survival hopes with a 1-0 win over play-off chasing Blackburn.

arts.ttl: Stoke boost survival hopes with victory over Blackburn
arts.sum: Al-Hamadi scored his second goal for Stoke.

arts.ttl: Stoke City team news vs Blackburn as midfielder misses out in four changes
arts.sum: Stoke: Johansson, Tchamadeu, Bocat, Phillips, Wilmot, Thompson, Burger, Baker, Manhoef, Junho, Al-Hamadi. Viktor Johansson starts in goal behind a back four of Bocat, Junior Tchamadeu, Ashley Phillips and Ben Wilmot, Baker and Thompson are in midfield with Wouter Burger.

arts.ttl: The Stoke City midfield Mark Robins must pick to stay up
arts.sum: We have assembled a 10-games-to-go fans' panel to run through key questions ahead of this fixtured to talk positives or negatives, midfield balance, most important players and whether Stoke will stay up. Mark Calladine: Stokes best midfield for me is Ben Pearson, Wouter Burger and Jordan Thompson.
